title: Apaches (1977) Unique Horror Film
description:
WOW, I'm amazed that no-one has put this nasty little thing yet! Apaches is unique among gore films in that it was designed to be shown to young children in primary schools to teach them safety. A bunch of children play cowboys-and-Indians on a farm, and die horrible deaths. I figure this thing was successful in keeping the kiddies out of emergency rooms... and putting them in mental hospitals instead.

Also included are some shorts from the same folks:

Jimmyyyyyy (Electical substations)
The Spirit of Dark and Lonely Water (water safety, featuring Donald Pleasance)
One More Dave (Drunk Driving)
Searching (Fire safety)
That's the last time I go to Willard's Chemists (Cheap medications)
The Finishing Line (Railway safety; very famous).

Also a Spanish anti-drinking thing.

Reseeded from youtube, there seems to be a demand for this sort of thing. In flv format (mostly).
